message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It seems fair considering the time pressure and the fact that the value decreases for me each round.
I think a 51/49 split is a more fair starting point, considering the inflation will impact you more heavily as the rounds continue. Let's try to find a solution that benefits both of us.
